alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 11 at 1:15PM MST until November 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph, with gusts up to 70 mph. Isolated wind gusts up to 80 mph along the immediate eastern slopes of the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains, and Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles or those pulling trailers.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
